UsesFairyRing: A million voices are speaking at once... How dare you use our own magic to exploit us!
CombustRing: You hear laughter in the distance. The Fairy Ring has spontaneously combusted!
ConfigDebuff.Name: Allow Debuffs
ConfigDebuff.Desc: Chance to get a debuff when collecting a Fairy Ring product.
ConfigDeath.Name: Allow Death
ConfigDeath.Desc: Chance to trigger death when collecting a Fairy Ring product.
ConfigFairyDust.Name: Allow Use of Fairy Dust
ConfigFairyDust.Desc: Can use Fairy Dust on a Fairy Ring. Mostly for debug purposes.
